text: Checkered Past is a Adult Swim programming block featuring cartoons from the late 90s and early 2000s that launched on August 28, 2023. It aired shows such as Courage the Cowardly Dog, Ed, Edd n Eddy, Dexter's Laboratory, and The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy. ==References== Category:Adult Swim Category:Cartoon Network
title: Checkered Past (TV programming block)
